item.title: Small Business Idea: Plaintext Myth Weaver: AI for Narrative & Lore
item.content:encoded:
The Idea: Plaintext Myth Weaver

Brief description of the idea:
Imagine a stripped-down, focused application that takes your plain text prompts and, powered by advanced AI, expands them into rich, structured game lore, character backgrounds, or branching interactive narratives. It’s a dedicated assistant for game writers and designers who prefer working with plain text but crave the creative spark and expansion capabilities of AI.

Core value proposition:

  • Rapid Prototyping: Instantly transform fragmented ideas into detailed, cohesive game lore or narrative structures, accelerating your world-building process.
  • Unleash Creativity: Overcome writer's block with AI-generated suggestions, alternate plotlines, and expanded character arcs, always in a flexible, editable plain text format.
  • Plain Text Power: Embrace the simplicity, portability, and future-proof nature of plain text (Markdown, YAML-like structures) as your core asset format, making integration with any game engine or toolset seamless.

Target customers:

Independent game developers, aspiring game writers, tabletop RPG dungeon masters, and content creators focused on narrative-driven experiences. Anyone who dreams of rich worlds and compelling stories, but finds traditional game development tools too cumbersome for initial narrative design.

Minimum viable product (MVP) scope which can be implemented in a day:

  1. Plain Text Input: A single, large text area (Markdown-enabled is a bonus) where the user types their initial prompt – a character concept, a historical event for their world, or the start of a story scene.
